title: Technical Support
description: Provided troubleshooting for digital services, networking, and software, delivering a high standard of support via phone and electronic channels. Documented solutions and managed escalations, developing communication skills crucial for cross-functional collaboration and user support. Contributed to process improvements and optimized response times through feedback to leadership.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Designed and developed a school management system with a focus on scalable, responsive front-end and back-end solutions. Conducted regular testing and debugging to enhance application performance and security, with an emphasis on clean, maintainable code.
